mapper.insert: insert into find_board(find_board_num, board_code, nickname, title, content, readcount, pet_type, missing_date, pet_name, pet_age, pet_gender,address, address2, result, insert_date, delete_date, detail_address, reward) values (#{find_board_num},'f',#{nickname},"title", #{content},#{readcount},#{pet_type},#{missing_date}, #{pet_name},#{pet_age},#{pet_gender},#{address},#{address2}, #{result},#{insert_date},#{delete_date},#{detail_address},#{reward})
mapper.select: select * from find_board order by find_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from find_board where result = "1" order by find_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from find_board where result="1"
select distinct address2 from address where address1=#{province}
select distinct address3 from address where address1=#{address1} and address2=#{address2}
mapper.insert: insert into find_board_file(file_num, find_board_num, board_code, upload, filename, save_filename, file_upload_date, ext) values (#{file_num},#{find_board_num},#{board_code},#{upload},#{filename},#{save_filename},#{file_upload_date},#{ext})
